question: 1.  For storing DC operating point the command used is ____
2. Analysis done to study the effect of time is called ____

answers.a: Inductor is replaced with short circuit, capacitor is replaced with open circuit
answers.b: Inductor is replaced with open circuit, capacitor is replaced with open circuit
answers.c: Inductor is replaced with open circuit, capacitor is replaced with short circuit
answers.d: Inductor is replaced with short circuit, capacitor is replaced with short circuit
